CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 6, 1957, pg. A2, reads: "Bethel's Loyal Women - Enthusiastic assistance and attendance came from the women of Bethel at the church's last services on June 30. The historic edifice will be razed as a part of the city's redevelopment program.  Left to right: Mmes. Marion Lias, Stella Smith, Miss Madeline Jackson, Mmes. Margaret W. Johnson, Christine F. Jefferson, Hallie B. Till and Mrs. G. G. Turfley were among those attending the final services at the Elm St. site. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Marion Lias, Stella Smith, Madeline Jackson, Margaret W. Johnson, Christine F. Jefferson, Hallie B. Till, and Mrs. G. G. Turfley, posed in Bethel AME Church
